LanguageData.Tatami_1Green.label: 1Tatami(Green)
LanguageData.Tatami_1Green.description: Tatami of 1 quire size.Tatami has a function to purify air and adjust humidity.Also flame retardancy is very good so it will not burn even if a fire occurs.
